content: square yarn tails must be sewn in groups/teams examples of team/group names could be south side baptist church ravelry team 1 crochetville team 5 knitting paradise team 1 online angel members or groups/organizations with more than 4 20 active members who are participating in this charity square drive contest must participate as individuals or break the groups into smaller teams of no more than 10 people per team working against all other groups/teams for the bragging rights of their team winning the most points and the prize for their organization remember to keep the same team/group name during the entire contest a group/organization may have many teams but teams may not be larger than 10 people register you must register by emailing cindy at smoothfoxhelpercindy@yahoo com - just tell her you are participating as a team and the team name or that you are participating as an individual deadline and winner notification in order to qualify for a prize your squares must be received before january 14 2012 please mail in your squares monthly so we can track your progress on the blog winners will be notified by email mail and certified mail after january 15 2012 certified mail is available to us residents only how to win earn the most points by crocheting squares as either an individual or a team/group or just be the lucky random drawing winner who submitted a square even one square could earn you a prize point values per square are squares made using smoothfox patterns will receive higher points smoothfox crochet 6 x 6 or 7 x 7 square pattern = 2 points smoothfox crochet 12 x12 square pattern = 8 points non smoothfox crochet 6 x 6 or 7 x 7 square pattern = 1 point non smoothfox crochet 12 x 12 square pattern = 4 points knit 6 x 6 squares = 2 points knit 12 x 12 squares - 8 points suggestions of smoothfox patterns are below but you may use any smoothfox pattern if 6x6 7x7 or 12x12 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-charity-square-nbr-1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-charity-square-nbr-2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-charity-square-nbr-3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-charity-square-nbr-4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-may-flower---square-6x6-or-applique http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-starburst-flower-square http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-amethyst-square-12x12 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-lemony-lime-citrus-square-12x12 i will be updating each of the above patterns with the form to mail in with your package to receive a copy of the form emailed directly to you email cindy at smoothfoxhelpercindy@yahoo com you must submit with your package a list of your square counts sizes and the points you feel you have obtained however mary of online angels has final say on determining if your counts are right and i have the final say in all disputes changing or implementing new rules as unique questions are asked for a list of these rules email cindy at smoothfoxhelpercindy@yahoo com if you d like to see the online angel website -
